definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: Don't leave the engine to warm up in winter; you're burning petrol unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的時候，不要讓引擎空轉，這是在不必要地費油。

sentences.english: Your joke spared her needless embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 你的笑話解除了她不必要的焦慮。

sentences.english: Theresult, he said, wouldbe unnecessary volatility.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這樣做會導致不必要的波動。

sentences.english: Within the informal work method of RUP, this is often unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 在RUP方法的正式工作中，這常常是不必要的。

sentences.english: This, in turn, may cause more page breaks than are strictly necessary.
sentences.chinese: 這進而會導致一些嚴格說來不必要的換頁。

sentences.english: Doing so would help prevent the sample from becoming unnecessarily moist.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做會有助於阻止樣品不必要的受潮。

sentences.english: It sets up an unnecessary contingency.
sentences.chinese: 它增加了不必要的意外。

sentences.english: The next tip is to avoid unnecessarily “inflating” tasks.
sentences.chinese: 下一個技巧是避免讓任務不必要地“膨脹”。

sentences.english: In writing telegrams, omit superfluous words .
sentences.chinese: 寫電報稿要省去不必要的字。

sentences.english: Deciding whether or not to help out is often an unnecessary mental lag.
sentences.chinese: 決定是否幫助別人通常是一種不必要的精神負擔。

sentences.english: Seems like a needlessly large risk.
sentences.chinese: 似乎是不必要的高風險。
開始剔除不必要的事情。

sentences.english: Incorrect interpretation of conclusions drawn from laboratory studies have unnecessarily alarmed some people.
sentences.chinese: 對實驗室研究結論的曲解導致了某些人不必要的恐慌。

sentences.english: You need a budget. Eliminate all the nonessential costs in your life.
sentences.chinese: 你需要做個預算，避免生活中所有不必要的開支。

sentences.english: No perpendicular fall is necessary, in front any more than in the rear.
sentences.chinese: 無論朝前和朝後，陡直的下墜總是不必要的。

sentences.english: Don't ruin the mood with these unnecessary outside forces.
sentences.chinese: 不要因爲這些不必要的外部因素破壞了心情。
